sections.heading: Investment of sinking funds and surplus or idle funds of municipality9-492
sections.text: Investment of sinking funds and surplus or idle funds of municipalityA. The governing body of a municipality may invest its sinking funds in United States, state, or county bonds or in bonds, debentures or other obligations i
